intro.p: This node is part of the legacy Quick Form nodes and will be deprecated soon. The replacement for this node can be found in the configuration/widget nodes. For more information on these new nodes see this blog post.
Displays an image. Some of the settings are only applied in the KNIME WebPortal.

The node supports custom CSS styling. You can simply put CSS rules into a single string and set it as a flow variable 'customCSS' in the node configuration dialog. You will find the list of available classes and their description on our documentation page.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If enabled the embedded image will not be larger than specified. Note, the aspect ratio is maintained if the image gets scaled down (only one of maximum width/height is applied).
If enabled the embedded image will not be larger than specified.

ports.inPort: The image input in SVG or PNG format.
